hero.name: Artem Stakhov
hero.greeting: Hello, I'm Artem Stakhov â€” Software Engineer with Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Software Engineering. Passionate about web development, automation, and AI.

roadmap.title: School
roadmap.description: Attended school in Nyzhniy Teplyi, Luhansk region. Developed foundational knowledge in mathematics and sciences.

roadmap.title: College
roadmap.description: Studied at College of Engineering and Technology in Severodonetsk, affiliated with V.Dal University. Learned discrete mathematics, Pascal, mathematical analysis, and more. Gave a strong start in programming.

roadmap.title: Bachelor's Degree
roadmap.description: Bachelor's in Software Engineering at Uzhhorod National University. Overall grade: 75%, Diploma defended with 5 (90-100%).

roadmap.title: Master's Degree
roadmap.description: Master's in Software Engineering at Uzhhorod National University. Expected grade around 85%, Diploma to be defended with 5 (90-100%).

roadmap.title: Freelance Start
roadmap.description: Started as a freelance front-end developer. Created landing pages with HTML, JS, Sass. Project: https://github.com/artemstakhov/hadar_front

roadmap.title: CityUnscripted
roadmap.description: Front-end Developer at CityUnscripted (Ukraine-UK). Worked with React, Redux, JS, jQuery. Became lead React developer, handled design, React Native app, Cypress tests.

roadmap.title: InkoMenu Freelance
roadmap.description: Tech Lead at InkoMenu (Ukraine). Developed admin panel and client site with React, Redux. Handled translations, themes, custom components.

roadmap.title: Relocation to Lithuania
roadmap.description: Moved to Lithuania in September 2026, living in Jonava, Kaunas district. Started learning n8n and automation. Built media farm with AI in Telegram, video generation with transcription.

experience.description: Designed and developed features and pages with/without design. Used React, Redux, JS, jQuery. Included modals, animations, responsive design. Handled design, React Native app, Cypress tests. Became lead for React SPA.
Designed and developed admin panel and client site with Figma. Used React, Redux, JS. Included translations, themes, custom components, animations. Reviewed backend code.
Created landing page with additional page from scratch. Pure JS, HTML, Sass. Modals, scroll animations, responsive design. Project: https://github.com/artemstakhov/hadar_front

certificates.name: Full course of React and JavaScript
Successful Startup: From Idea to Scaling
